tool_description: This API Allows to Get Amazon's developments, both of Bezos and Amazon, its growth as a video producer, the popular Prime service, as well as its own hardware, which includes the Amazon Kindle e-reader, Amazon Kindle Fire tablets, and Amazon Fire TV streaming boxes News  Title, Link And Thumbnail.
name: Amazon News
title: Amazon News

api_list.name: Get Amazon Top News
api_list.description: This endpoint will return back all the top news about Amazon.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://amazon-news.p.rapidapi.com/top-news"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "amazon-news.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get All Amazon  Latest News
api_list.description: This endpoint will return back all the latest news about Amazon.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://amazon-news.p.rapidapi.com/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "amazon-news.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
